short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display a list of all open tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Tab Manager: Streamline Your Tab Management

Take control of your browser tabs effortlessly. This powerful Chrome extension provides a clear overview of your tabs and enhances your browsing efficiency.

Key Features:
• Tab Overview: Instantly view all your tabs across windows in a clean interface
• Smart Pinning: Pin and unpin important tabs with a single click
• Window Organization: Tabs intelligently grouped by windows for better context
• Audio Visualization: Dynamic wave indicator for tabs playing sound
• Quick Search: Instantly find and navigate to the tab you need
• Drag & Drop: Freely rearrange tabs within and across windows
• Efficient Controls: Close unnecessary tabs directly from the overview

Perfect for:
• Professionals managing multiple research tabs
• Students working with various learning resources
• Users who want to maintain a clean browser workspace
• Anyone needing quick tab navigation and organization

Chrome Tab Manager helps you stay organized and focused by providing a clear overview of all your tabs. Transform tab management from a burden into a breeze with this essential productivity tool.

Install Chrome Tab Manager now and enhance your browsing experience!
